Try to keep the balloons in the air and off the spikes. Tap, bobble, and bump your way to fun. With multiple games modes, achievements, and leader boards there is something for everyone. reviews.title: You now need to read my phone state?
reviews.comment: Sorry, I don\'t like sharing so much personal information with a game. Uninstalled and disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent, simple fun
reviews.comment: \"Too simple\"? \"not as good as Angry Birds\"? Are you having a laugh? This enjoyable, easy to pick up FREE game is a great way to while away time. Simple concept, nicely executed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun, but can be pretty boring. Angry Birds is so much more fun. Plus it has more versions.

reviews.title: Why the huge update?
reviews.comment: Fun game, but why is there an update so large that I get a warning about it? I\'m not setting up wifi just to download a silly game update. Will probably soon uninstall when I get sick of the update reminders.
